creator: XBet Edge
descriptionHtml:
XBet Edge - Free Football Stats Tips & Predictions is a fully automated free football app that allows users to make informed betting decisions using probabilities.

⚽ MAKE THE RIGHT BET!

We provide over 100 statistics from over 35 major leagues around the world that are statistically calculated based on historical previous occurrences to provide colour coded probabilities to help betters easily find trends, patterns and more importantly value. If you are looking for a football bet predictions app or soccer predictions app that helps you win football bets, then this app is perfect for you! This is one of those soccer predictions latest apps that will help you to make the right bet.

⚽ MAIN FIXTURES

Our main fixture page cover 8 key markets/stats Over 1.5, 2.5 Goals, Over 0.5 FH Goals, BTTS, Over 7.5, 8.5 Corners and Over 2.5, 3.5 Cards colour coded to help you easily see the highest (green) and lowest (red) probabilities. The stats are colour coded as per the following:

GREEN (85%+) showing the highest probability/highest previous occurrences and indicates a good selection for an overs market.

AMBER (70%-84.99%) showing medium probability with medium previous occurrences and indicates a good selection to help find value.

RED (<69.99%) showing the lowest probability/lowest previous occurrences and indicates a good selection for an unders market.


⚽ SORTING & FILTERING

Football betting has never been easier! This football bet predictor and tips app allows you to easily sort the Highest and Lowest probabilities on the main fixture page covering markets like match goals, first half goals, both teams to score, corners and cards to assist you in choosing the right overs or unders market that has the highest chance of winning. You can also filter on the League, Time and Date. Place the best bet for free using this football betting stats, tips and prediction app, and cut your research down by 85%.


⚽ NEED MORE STATISTICS?

If you need more statistics regarding soccer and football betting predictions - we got you covered...simply clicking on the fixture will reveal over 100 more statistics covering goals, corners, cards and even Half Time stats to help you get on the right in-plays and build winning bet builders. Graphical displays allows users to easily visualise the last 10 games form to find any trends and patterns. Bet on football with a higher chance to win football bets with XBet Edge!


⚽ WISDOM OF THE CROWD

If you are looking for a free football betting app that allows you to see what others are betting on and help build confidence in picking your own selections, then this one of those football sports picks and predictions app you want to try! These are displayed in orange badges next to the stat.


⚽ FOLLOW OUR PREDICTIONS

Our betting predictions or soccer match predictions are backed by topnotch technology. Follow along with some of our automated predications which uses the highest probabilities to pick out various selections including a Daily Bet, Other Bets and even a Roller never seen in an app. All our predictions come with a risk level from safe bets to very risky bets to help you determine what stake you should use and which predictions to follow. Choose what football bets and predictions to follow knowing that all selections are backed by stats.


⚽ OTHER FEATURES

1) View recommended strategies to help you win or create your own winning strategies. The possibilities are endless
2) Add fixtures to your favorites list
3) Dynamic searching of fixtures
4) Game status to see which games are upcoming, in-play and completed


⚽🥅⚽🥅⚽🥅
descriptionShort: Make informed betting decisions. Soccer predictions, tips. Bet & win at football

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: First live version released all over the world.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Following features have been added to the app update
1. Guest Login: enable users to use the app without sharing their details. However, certain features such as favourites and wisdom of the crowd voting might require users to register a proper account.
2. Most Backed Bets: the most voted bets are now shown in a separate section making it easier to catch important details.
Apart from these two fixtures a few other minor tweaks have been made to make the app more user friendly.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Following features have been added to the update
1. On main fixtures 2 new icons have been added.
Caution- informing users to approach the game with caution due to lack of data
SOTD Stats Of The Day - A fixture that has the highest stats of the day. Same game bet builders are recommended.
2. Some changes to optimise ads have been made including some new ads have been introduced to main fixtures page and the unlock timer has now been reduced to 2mins.
3. In app messages added to notify users
